task.title: Connect to your data
task.shortdesc: The first step is to connect to the data you want to explore.

context.p: This example shows how to connect to Sample - Superstore data in Tableau Desktop.

step.cmd: On the start page, under Connect, click Microsoft Excel.
In the Open dialog box, navigate to the Sample - Superstore Excel file on your computer.
Select Sample - Superstore, and then click Open.
After you connect to the Excel data, the Data Source page shows the sheets or tables in your data. Drag the "Orders" table to the canvas to start exploring that data.
step.info: Depending on how your data is structured, you might need to do more data preparation and integration before you start exploring it in Tableau. For more details on connecting to your data, see Connect to and Prepare Data and Tips for Working with Your Data.

step.cmd: Click the sheet tab to go to the new worksheet and begin your analysis.
